adrFormatAddress: 131 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: One of the best places to shop for Indian formal wear. I enjoyed my shopping experience at Heritage India Fashions. This is the place to shop for Indian clothing. The prices are fair. They have a huge selection and the latest designs. I was very much impressed. Customer service was just amazing. I did see signs that photographs are not allowed. I totally understand where they are coming from. They let us take pictures of my girl at the store. I am so happy that we came to this amazing place. I did see that Heritage India Fashions has won many awards and can understand why it’s just fabulous place to shop. I recommend Heritage for all your wedding formal wear. They also have amazing organic incense. Rose and Nag Champa are a dream so natural. They do have an exchange policy within seven days of purchase as they only sell one of a kind designs. Totally satisfied with my purchase at Heritage. If your in New York must come by this lovely store. Give it 10/10 stars to this place.

originalText.text: We are so thankful we found Heritage India Fashions! We were nervous about finding the right outfits for our friends Sangeet Ceremony, but the couple at the store were so incredibly helpful! We were so happy with the outfits and got so many compliments! I love the fact that the women’s outfit was one size fits all, so no adjustments or alterations were needed. They guided us in choosing appropriate attire and color and made sure to check our budget before choosing selections. Thank you so much Heritage India Fashions!

originalText.text: If you are an American attending your first Indian wedding, you MUST go to Heritage India Fashions for all of your occasion outfits and styling help. The husband & wife run shop was extremely patient with my fiance & I and helped us pick out the perfect pieces (lehenga for me, kurta for him). They made it so easy and had a beautiful selection. I cannot recommend them enough.

originalText.text: Ruchi! Wow what an experience I had with her at this beautiful store. I came in last second looking for a look. Not only did Ruchi listen to my needs, she exceeded any and all expectations. This was my first time shopping for traditional Indian attire but it was one of the best shopping experiences I have had. She carefully picked out an outfit for me, adjusted it with the little time we had and helped accessorize too! Ruchi made me feel welcomed and treated me like a queen! Thank you for being the best! Much love and appreciation to you.

Much love and appreciation to you.

originalText.text: I had a fabulous shopping experience at Heritage India Fashions!  I was looking for two traditionally Indian outfits for a wedding in India and needed desperate help.  Ruchi, the creative stylist at Heritage,  provided all the help and guidance I was hoping for. Patient, kind, very knowledgable and eager to help, Ruchi found and fitted on me a beautiful royal blue lehenga and gorgeous dark red pre-draped saree.  I immediately could tell the excellent quality of the garments, smooth silk and very comfortable to wear!  Ruchi also understood my price range and suggested I use the same top for both garments, which saved me some money. I still overall spent a bit more than I'd meant to, but I know it was worth it for these quality dresses, which I know I'll have for the rest of my life!  Ruchi also helped me find two amazing, reasonably-priced Indian earrings to go with my outfits.  I'm grateful for the shopping experience—which was also much faster than I thought it would be!—and would highly recommend this place!!!
